scripts.gitpod-prepare: npm run git-shh-to-https && (yes | sudo apt install screen) && (yes | sudo apt install rsync) && (yes | sudo apt install net-tools) && screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.packages-ci: (cd packages && for d in */; do (cd $d && npm ci); done)
scripts.deepcase-build-core: cd packages/deepcase && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deepcase-electron: cd packages/deepcase && rm -rf ./electron/out && cp -r ./out ./electron/out && npm run electron-dev
scripts.local: cross-env npm_config_yes=true NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=1 JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://localhost:3006 npm run local-core
scripts.local-core: concurrently "npm run deepcase" "npm run deeplinks" "npm run local-engine"
scripts.electron-dev: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=1 MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://localhost:3006 npm run electron-dev-core)
scripts.electron-dev-core: npm ci && npm run apply-hasura && npm run apply-deeplinks && npm run deepcase-build && npm run deepcase-electron
scripts.electron-build: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=1 MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://localhost:3006 npm run electron-build-core)
scripts.electron-build-core: npm ci && npm run apply-hasura && npm run apply-deeplinks && npm run deepcase-build && cp -r packages/deepcase/out packages/deepcase/electron/out && (cd packages/deepcase/electron && npm run electron:pack && npm run electron:sign)
scripts.gitpod: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey;  export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1 HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); npm run gitpod-core
scripts.gitpod-core: npm run gitpod-prepare && npm ci && npm run apply-hasura && npm run apply-deeplinks && concurrently "npm run deepcase" "npm run deeplinks" "npm run gitpod-engine"
scripts.gitpod-engine: cd packages/deeplinks && npm run start-engine-docker && npx -q wait-on tcp:8080 && sleep 20 && npm run migrate
scripts.gitpod-wakeup: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1 HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); concurrently "npm run deepcase" "npm run deeplinks" "(cd packages/deeplinks && npm run start-engine-docker)"
scripts.gitpod-migrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1 HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); cd packages/deeplinks && npm run migrate
scripts.gitpod-unmigrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1 HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); cd packages/deeplinks && npm run unmigrate
scripts.local-migrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}"; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 export DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=localhost:3006; cd packages/deeplinks && npm run migrate
scripts.local-unmigrate: export NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=0; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1; export npm_config_yes=true; export JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 export DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=localhost:3006; cd packages/deeplinks && npm run unmigrate
scripts.git-shh-to-https: git config --global url."https://".insteadOf git:// && git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/
scripts.apply-deeplinks: (rm -rf ./packages/deepcase/app && cd packages/deeplinks && npm run package:build && cd ../../ && npm run apply-deeplinks-deepcase && npm run apply-deeplinks-electron && cd packages/deeplinks && npm run package:unbuild)
scripts.apply-deeplinks-deepcase: rm -rf packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && rm -rf packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && rm -rf packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && rm -rf packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/index.* && rm -rf packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json && cp -r packages/deeplinks/imports packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && cp -r packages/deeplinks/migrations packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r packages/deeplinks/local packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && cp packages/deeplinks/index.* packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/ && cp packages/deeplinks/package.json packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json
scripts.apply-deeplinks-electron: rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/index.* && rm -rf packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json && cp -r packages/deeplinks/imports packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && cp -r packages/deeplinks/migrations packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r packages/deeplinks/local packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && cp packages/deeplinks/index.* packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/ && cp packages/deeplinks/package.json packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json
scripts.cp-hasura: (cd ./packages/hasura && npm ci && npm run package:build) && cp -r ./packages/hasura/ ./packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura && rm -rf ./packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura/node_modules && cp -r ./packages/hasura/ ./packages/deeplinks/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura && rm -rf ./packages/deeplinks/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura/node_modules && cp -r ./packages/hasura/ ./packages/materialized-path/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura && rm -rf ./packages/materialized-path/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura/node_modules && cp -r ./packages/hasura ./packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura && rm -rf ./packages/deepcase/electron/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura/node_modules && (cd ./packages/hasura && npm run package:unbuild)
scripts.apply-hasura: npm run rm-hasura && npm run cp-hasura
